name: LinkedIn Post Generator
description: Creates a LinkedIn post based on user input (product, tone, keywords, etc) that's optimized for SEO.

appStages.name: Intro
Run
appStages.stageDetails:
{
  "components": [
    {
      "label": "HTML",
      "attrs": [
        {
          "attr": "",
          "value": ""
        }
      ],
      "content": "\u003cdiv class\u003d\"introduction\"\u003e\r\n  \u003cdiv class\u003d\"header\"\u003e\r\n    \u003ch3\u003eLinkedin Post Generator\u003c/h3\u003e\r\n  \u003c/div\u003e\r\n\r\n  \u003csection\u003e\r\n    \u003ch4\u003e\u003c/h4\u003e\r\n    \u003cul\u003e\r\n      \u003cli\u003e\u003cspan\u003e+\u003c/span\u003eInput the fields below to effortlessly create engaging, professional posts by leveraging AI to draft content based on selected topics, tone, \r\n      and audience—boosting visibility and personal branding..\u003c/li\u003e\r\n       \u003c/ul\u003e\r\n  \u003c/section\u003e\r\n   \u003c/div\u003e",
      "refreshOnChange": false,
      "key": "html",
      "type": "htmlelement",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Topic",
              "placeholder": "ex. Using AI to streamline hiring ",
              "description": "Briefly describe what the post is about a product, idea, trend, experience, or insight.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "topic_idea_product",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Target Audience",
              "placeholder": "ex. Startup founders",
              "description": "Specify the target audience for this topic, including key groups or individuals its intended to reach.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "target_audience",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Voice",
              "widget": "choicesjs",
              "placeholder": "Professional",
              "description": "Choose the overall style or personality you want your blog to follow.",
              "tooltip": "The consistent personality or style behind your content that reflects who is speaking. Voice stays steady across posts and shapes the overall identity.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "data": {
                "values": [
                  {
                    "label": "Personal",
                    "value": "Authentic, relatable, and conversational"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Professional",
                    "value": "Polished, formal, and businesslike"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Thought Leadership",
                    "value": "Authoritative, confident, and expert"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Brand",
                    "value": "Consistent with company values and tone"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Inspirational",
                    "value": "Motivational and uplifting"
                  }
                ]
              },
              "key": "voice",
              "type": "select",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Tone",
              "placeholder": "ex. Friendly",
              "description": "Select the mood or attitude you want the post to convey.",
              "tooltip": "The mood or attitude of a specific post that adapts to context (e.g., professional, casual, inspirational). Tone adjusts how the voice expresses itself to fit the message.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "tone",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns1",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Keywords",
              "placeholder": "ex. Recruitment innovation, AI in HR",
              "description": "Enter keywords to guide the post content.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "keywords",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Call to Action",
              "placeholder": "ex. Ask for others experience with AI in hiring",
              "description": "Write what you want readers to do after reading your post (e.g., comment, connect, follow).",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "key": "call_to_action",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns4",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Post Length",
              "widget": "choicesjs",
              "placeholder": "Short",
              "description": "Choose the length of the post.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": true,
              "data": {
                "values": [
                  {
                    "label": "Short",
                    "value": "short"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Medium",
                    "value": "medium"
                  },
                  {
                    "label": "Long",
                    "value": "long"
                  }
                ]
              },
              "key": "length",
              "type": "select",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Hashtags",
              "optionsLabelPosition": "right",
              "description": "Choose a topic area to generate relevant hashtags for your post",
              "tooltip": "Helps boost reach and visibility on LinkedIn.",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "defaultValue": {
                "aiTech": false,
                "startupsEntrepreneurship": false,
                "marketingBranding": false,
                "careerPersonalGrowth": false,
                "productivityWorkCulture": false,
                "ha": false,
                "has": false,
                "hash": false,
                "hasht": false,
                "hashtags": false,
                "hashta": false,
                "hashtag": false
              },
              "values": [
                {
                  "label": "AI \u0026 Tech",
                  "value": "hashtags",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Startups \u0026 Entrepreneurship",
                  "value": "hashtags",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Marketing \u0026 Branding",
                  "value": "hashtags",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Career \u0026 Personal Growth",
                  "value": "hashtags",
                  "shortcut": ""
                },
                {
                  "label": "Productivity \u0026 Work Culture",
                  "value": "hashtags",
                  "shortcut": ""
                }
              ],
              "key": "hashtags",
              "type": "selectboxes",
              "input": true,
              "inputType": "checkbox"
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns3",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Destination Path",
              "customClass": "m-3",
              "hidden": true,
              "tableView": true,
              "defaultValue": "data/GENAI/TEST-Prachi/LinkedIn-Post-Generator/",
              "clearOnHide": false,
              "key": "destinationPath",
              "type": "textfield",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns2",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    },
    {
      "label": "Generated Post",
      "editor": "ckeditor",
      "autoExpand": false,
      "customClass": "m-4",
      "tableView": true,
      "key": "genAiResponse",
      "type": "textarea",
      "isUploadEnabled": false,
      "input": true
    },
    {
      "label": "Columns",
      "columns": [
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Back",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "secondary",
              "customClass": "btn-outline rounded m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "back",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "back",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        },
        {
          "components": [
            {
              "label": "Generate",
              "action": "event",
              "showValidations": false,
              "theme": "info",
              "customClass": "float-right rounded m-3",
              "tableView": false,
              "key": "generate",
              "type": "button",
              "event": "execute",
              "input": true
            }
          ],
          "width": 6,
          "offset": 0,
          "push": 0,
          "pull": 0,
          "size": "md",
          "currentWidth": 6
        }
      ],
      "key": "columns5",
      "type": "columns",
      "input": false,
      "tableView": false
    }
  ]
}
